attributes.title: GET THE APP
attributes.review: I installed the app because I wanted to be patriotic because I love my president. After it downloaded I got several emails about someone in Russia logging into all of my websites. It sold my information to Russia! But on the bright side I can still buy my MAGA door mat so it’s all worth it in the end. trump we love you <3

attributes.title: Wow
attributes.review: This app literally broke my iphone, downloaded it and it crashed every time I opened it. Now my screen doesn’t work and I had to go back to my old iphone, can’t believe apple let: apps like the app store. So looks like i’ll have to save up for a new phone again.

attributes.title: Bruh
attributes.review: Why bruh. Just why. Like when I downloaded it stuff started popping up on my phone. Then a whole bunch of wieners came alive from my fridge and then kept saying mean things to me. Like “1D will never come back” or “Melon Martini will never release an album again” and it made me sad 😭 Please send help!

attributes.title: I’m literally so disappointed right now ❤️
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to see what I can do to support the ABSOLUTE BEST PRESIDENT IN FOREVER! But Trump has disappointed me with this app as it has taken literally a day to download and when I opened it it, it crashed and just left constant messages about nothing like MAGA!

Chile, anyways...

attributes.title: This is the worst app ever!
attributes.review: I’m not sure what I was expecting from this app, but they are marketing a rotten Tangerine! I’m not sure about everyone else, but I know I like my tangerines to be fresh and advocate for equal rights and protections amongst all people not threaten to shoot other members occupying the same county as this tangerine. 0 out of 5 stars!

attributes.title: The power of Trump
attributes.review: The power he has is immense yet when you use this app it is clear that he himself tried to program it and it shows. He tried to get my number right away and as a married man I find that very inappropriate. Also he’s ugly and looks like he need a good SPF.

attributes.title: Attention
attributes.userName: why are all the nicnames taken
attributes.review: This app took a long while to download and did not run properly even when I opened it I found there was not much on both sides of a political stand point and most of the articles and Dutch were very racist and did not tell the full story

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This app is terribly dangerous it has spread COVID-19 on purpose, and killed over 130,000 Americans. This app breaks every law possible and still is not in prison. This app has been all over Twitter ranting like a lunatic, threatening people and inciting violence. This app is racist, xenophobic, homophobic, and just all around bad do not download it will brainwash you into being a magat.

attributes.title: Smh
attributes.review: First things first It took three whole days to download! Then every time I would click on the app it shut my phone off. Not only that whenever it would work my phone battery would go down by 25. This is the worst app I’ve ever used.

attributes.title: HORRENDOUS 🤢🤢
attributes.review: first of all it took over 48 hours to download, ridiculous!! second of i turned the notifs off for this app and they still sent notifications to me anyways!! creepy!! how could such an awful app be on this appstore. and don’t even get me started on the dangers of it also!!
